title: 1360 E 52nd St in Hyde Park-1BD:Heat,HDWD,DW,MW,Laundry on Site
posting_body: A MUST HAVE charming two bedroom located in the Hyde Park neighborhood!
This beautiful apartment features FREE Heat, dishwasher, microwave, granite countertops and separate dining area!
Hardwood floors, good closet space and laundry on site!
Close to University of Chicago, Harper Theater, Target and Whole Foods as well as the great restaurants nearby, Hyde Park shops and eateries!
Steps away from CTA buses and transit to downtown!
To schedule a showing for this amazing property, please call Eric at 773-570-1685.
To see our other availability please visit our website at <URL>.
We look forward to serving your housing needs!
$75 Application fee per person and co-signer if required
$100 Cat fee per cat if applicable (limit 2)
$35/Monthly Dog Fee (limit: 1 up to 35lbs.)(Non-Aggressive Breed Only)
